```{r}
library(DiagrammeR)
grViz("digraph flowchart {
      # node definitions with substituted label text
      node [fontname = Helvetica, shape = rectangle]        
      tab1 [label = '@@1']
      tab2 [label = '@@2']
      tab3 [label = '@@3']
      tab4 [label = '@@4']
      tab5 [label = '@@5']

      # edge definitions with the node IDs
      tab1 -> tab2 
      tab1 -> tab3
      tab2 -> tab4
      tab2 -> tab5
      tab3 -> tab4
      tab3 -> tab5 
      }

      [1]: '我家'
      [2]: '我爸'
      [3]: '我妈'
      [4]: '我'
      [5]: '我弟'
      ")

```
